title: Episode 14: Social Spiritality & Our Current Dilemma
description: Lisa Johnson reads and discusses Ram Dass' s Be Here Now on the chapter of Family Sadnana. This relates to the current topic of gun control in America. Are guns really the problem or is the lack of spiritual growth in our individual family units? Listen and get informed to solutions that make you think deeper.
